parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not definitive proof that the post is not electoral propaganda, it is a factor to consider.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "AUR" (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor), a parliamentary candidate.  The text "Votăm AUR" directly advocates for voting for this party. This strongly suggests that "Article 36 (7) - a" applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The message is not a private communication; it's intended for public consumption. Therefore, "Article 36 (7) - c" is likely applicable.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support AUR in the parliamentary elections. The phrase "Votăm AUR" leaves no doubt about its intention to influence voting behavior. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not present news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a specific political party. It fails to meet the criteria of journalistic reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action to vote for a particular party.  The use of the imperative "Votăm AUR" eliminates any ambiguity.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>967965638717422</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific parliamentary candidate (AUR), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose AUR. The post's content is not journalistic or a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement.  The timing of the post, considering the provided end date, is crucial. If the post was published after the official end of the electoral campaign period, it would constitute a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor (AUR)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Ciprian Paraschiv</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Ciprian Paraschiv, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (data de încheiere a campaniei electorale), cu mesajul explicit „Votăm AUR!”,  având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea partidului AUR,  constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei, conform legislației în vigoare.  Postarea, cu ID-ul 967965638717422,  încalcă prevederile legale prin promovarea directă a unui candidat la alegerile parlamentare după data limită.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
